content: A skillful song,  a didactic  reflective poem, of David; when he was in the cave. A Prayer.
I make supplication with my voice to the .
I pour out my complaint before Him;
I declare my trouble before Him.
When my spirit was overwhelmed  weak within me [wrapped in darkness],
In the way where I walk
They have hidden a trap for me.
Look to the right [the point of attack] and see;
For there is no one who has regard for me [to act in my favor].
Escape has failed me  I have nowhere to run;
No one cares about my life.
